verses.roman:
mleccha-gaṇa āsi' prabhura vandila caraṇa
prabhu-āge kahe,--ei ṭhak cāri-jana

synonyms: mleccha-gaṇa—the Mohammedan soldiers; āsi'-after coming there; prabhura—of Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; vandila caraṇa—worshiped the lotus feet; prabhu-āge kahe—said before the Lord; ei ṭhak cāri-jana—these four persons are rogues.
translation: All the Mohammedan soldiers then came before the Lord, worshiped His lotus feet and said, "Here are four rogues.
